message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. I believe it can significantly enhance your experience and productivity. For this exceptional opportunity, I am offering the product at a special introductory price of $12000. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the detailed description of the product. While I'm interested, $12000 is a bit higher than my budget.  Would you be willing to consider $9500? I believe this price is fair and allows for a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and am willing to negotiate further. I propose a revised price of $10500 for the product. This still reflects its high value and quality, while accommodating your financial considerations. Please let me know if this proposal works for you.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $10500 is still a bit out of my range.  I'm willing to go up to $10000, which is my absolute limit. Let me know if this works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. Considering the value of the product and the discussions we've had, I am prepared to offer the product at $9800. I hope this revised price meets your requirements and allows us to reach an agreement.
